zone.line: And as She grows, her beams more bright &
bright
hovering
Are poured from Heaven, where she is wandering
then
A wonder & a sign to mortal men.
The Son of Saturn with this glorious Power
Mingled in love & sleep — to whom she bare
a bright maid of fair
Pandeia, a bright rg of beauty rare
Among the gods whose lives eternal are
Hail Queen, great Moon, white armed Divinity
Fair haired & favorable — thus with thee
be gloriously proceeds
My song beginning , shall pour
with its music sweet

line.del: As mortal demigods, whose deeds hands

zone.line: Shall make immortal many a glorious feat
They shall the servants of the Muses
Of mortal demigods, which minstrels tell

To make immortal thy sleep-mazing deeds
whose from lovely lips so well

zone.line: With lovely lips, slaves to the sacred Muse
